item.title: FT Most Read: Friday, September 20, 2024 at 12:30 PM UTC
item.description:
1. [Opinion] Young women are starting to leave men behind
2. Israel strikes Lebanese targets as Hizbollah chief warns of ‘red lines’ crossed
3. [Opinion] Musk, Thiel and the shadow of apartheid South Africa
4. Nike chief executive John Donahoe to step down
5. Amazon says workers need to be in the office. Most of Silicon Valley disagrees.
item.guid: FT Most Read: Friday, September 20, 2024 at 12:30 PM UTC
